summary: An ordinance authorizing and directing the City Treasurer, to cancel the assessment levied for the improvement of Youngstown Place, et al, by paving, etc., Local Improvement District No. 3709, on portions of Lots 12, 13 and 14, Block 1, Smith's Replat of Lots 11 to 20, Block 1, Steel Plant Addition, which have been deeded to the City of Seattle, for street purposes.
